title: In Ukraine, a Community of ‘Simple Believers’ Shuns the Modern World
summary_full: The Christians known as viruiuchi prostaky see electricity, cars, higher education and much else as distractions from what really matters.
summary_public: The Christians known as viruiuchi prostaky see electricity, cars, higher education and much else as distractions from what really matters.
